43859.summary: Some customers in the Silverado area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43859.title: Nov 11 – Calgary (Silverado) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
